column4: since installing 9.04 I've an issue with VLC and other video players. they all display video in another window, this is on the pc and the netbook, my pc was an upgrade the netbook was a raw install. what could be causing this and how can i fix it?
no idea what you mean by "they all display video in another window"
: the video is in one box and the normal window with the controls and where the video would normally play in an other
